com.example.hivefrontend.ui.home.Logic

Class HomeLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.hivefrontend.ui.home.Logic.HomeLogic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IHomeVolleyListener

    public class HomeLogic
extends java.lang.Object
implements IHomeVolleyListener
    Class to handle the logic for the HomeFragment, such as handling responses from the server.

      • onHiveRequestSuccess

        public void onHiveRequestSuccess(org.json.JSONArray response)
        Called after a successful server request for this user's hive information. Adds the hive ids and hive names to hiveIds and hiveOptions in the HomeFragment.
        Specified by:
        onHiveRequestSuccess in interface IHomeVolleyListener
        Parameters:
        response - The response back from server, containing memberships of this user.
